content:
On yesterday's FHIR-I call we agreed that our process for deciding our work group's 3 votes for TSC representative would be as follows:All who want to participate should email their preferred list of up to 3 representatives (from the list below or write-ins) by email or PM to me.  I will tally the responses and report to the WG on Monday and we will then submit our work group's vote. Please vote for up to 3 of the following (or write ins if you prefer):
Gora Datta
Anthony Julian
Ulrike Merrick
David Pyke
AbdulMalik Shakir
Reminder to please contact me prior to our call today if you want to participate in the vote
